title: JCR: Nuclear Posture, Nonproliferation Policy, and the Spread of Nuclear Weapons
description: Paul Huth, editor of Journal of Conflict Resolution, interviews guest editors Erik Gartzke and Matthew Kroenig about the April 2014 Special Issue: Nuclear Posture, Nonproliferation Policy, and the Spread of Nuclear Weapons.
content:encoded: Paul Huth, editor of Journal of Conflict Resolution, interviews guest editors Erik Gartzke and Matthew Kroenig about the April 2014 Special Issue: Nuclear Posture, Nonproliferation Policy, and the Spread of Nuclear Weapons.
